body_html:
Thanks, that does at least suggest there may be something funky with the build, since that's not an error I'd expect to see. Since you switched compilers, could you try

make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile clean

just to make sure that there are no weird linking issues with objects from different gcc versions (though that's a bit of a stretch). I'll try this on my Pi tomorrow too, to see if I can reproduce the problem.

body:
Thanks, that does at least suggest there may be something funky with the build, since that's not an error I'd expect to see. Since you switched compilers, could you try

``` bash
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile clean
```

just to make sure that there are no weird linking issues with objects from different gcc versions (though that's a bit of a stretch). I'll try this on my Pi tomorrow too, to see if I can reproduce the problem.
